attributes.action: UK TAX and Customs to make all safety equipment Zero VAT
attributes.additional_details: To push the UK revenue to remove all VAT on on safety equipment. This includes all personal protective equipment that is required by health and safety and working act regulations that enables a trader or worker to undertake there job safely without injury and all fire detection equipment such as smoke and carbon alarms, extinguishers, fire alarm systems and any related equipment. As it is wrong to make VAT out of someones safety. Britian leads the way in construction safety so lets ensure it stays that way.
